Reviews.Title: Nice DVR and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Brian Lynch
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these for a job we are doing at a Housing Development. Wow is all I can say. Lots of features and the layout is very simple to use. Now, we are not using the port forwarding feature for remote view but as a stand alone DVR, It is very nice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compression algorithm upgraded to H.264 High Profile, more  advanced video compression technique makes the code stream lowered at least  30%.
Completely new graphics operating interface design, to  let you experience easily and conveniently.
Super strong processing capacity: can realize 8CH D1 recording .
Powerful net service(support DHCP, PPPOE, FTP, DNS, DDNS, ARSP, NTP, UPNP, EMAIL, IP  authority, IP search, alarm center, etc), complete enclosure(WEB, CMS, SDK) to  easily achieve interconnection.
1 Year Warranty only if you purchase from Evertech USA Corp.
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech 8 Channel Real-time Hdmi DVR H.264 Full D1 High-definition Recording 1tb HDD Installed
